products.title: Buffett
products.subtitle: Warren Buffett, Chairman and CEO of Berkshire Hathaway.
products.name: Warren Buffett Bronze Bust
products.description: Have you ever wanted to work side by side with Warren Buffett? This is your chance. This version is slightly quieter, but his silent presence will always remind you to channel your inner scorecard and be greedy when others are fearful. Cast in premium Everdur bronze, with a 96% copper alloy, this 15' lead-free bust sits atop a 6' by 6' base made of 1.25' thick Blue Fantasy stone, to give a fitting finish to such an icon.

specifications.base: 6x6 inches Blue Fantasy stone (1.25 inches thick)

products.title: Munger
products.subtitle: Charlie Munger, Vice Chairman of Berkshire Hathaway.
products.name: Charlie Munger Bronze Bust
products.description: Charlie Munger, Vice Chairman of Berkshire Hathaway, like you've never seen him before. A perfect silent companion for your office, forever reminding you to 'invert, always invert'.

specifications.base: 6x6 inches Blue Fantasy stone (1.25 inches thick)

products.title: Get Both
products.subtitle: Charlie Munger and Warren Buffett, Both Vice Chairman of Berkshire Hathaway.
products.name: Warren and Charlie Bronze Busts
products.description: Each bust is cast in premium Everdur bronze, with a 96% copper alloy, these 15' lead-free busts sit atop a 6' by 6' base made of 1.25' thick Blue Fantasy stone, to give a fitting finish to such an icon.

specifications.base: 6x6 inches Blue Fantasy stone (1.25 inches thick)
